title: Behold Esports Black LF Diamond+ Support
body:
Hello,
Currently we are looking for a individual to join the main roster in the Support position. Looking for someone who is willing to talk and communicate in a team environment. Team is aiming to improve together and win tourneys to both earn experience and RP prizes. If you are interested please contact me on either here, League or Discord.
LoL Summoner Name: Mister E
Discord: LiLWilly#4179
